price: (24) And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.
arabic: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi
